meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thin and tall.
meanings.sent1: Her lankiness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His lankiness allowed him to easily reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The lankiness of the scarecrow made the birds think it was one of them!
meanings.sent4: The lankiness of the trees in the distance made them look like slender giants.
meanings.sent5: The lankiness of the model on the runway caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a lean and elongated appearance.
meanings.sent1: The lankiness of the cat made it a great hunter.
meanings.sent2: His lankiness in the basketball court helped him block shots effectively.
meanings.sent3: The lankiness of the lamp post made it look like a skinny ghost in the fog.
meanings.sent4: Her lankiness in the dance routine gave her a graceful and elegant presence.
meanings.sent5: The lankiness of the shadows in the alley made them seem like elongated monsters.
